title: Olympic Games-Seoul 1988
brief_description: The 1988 Summer Olympic Games in Seoul have been called the greatest of the modern era. As 160 nations competed in 23 sports for no less than 237 gold medals, the Olympic ideals of international goodwill and sporting excellence touched the world. The Golden Moments is an official highlights video of the Games.
